resources.string:
Benefits of Side Plank 
1)Strengthens the core. 
2)Reduces risk of back injury. 
3)Strengthens arms

Benefits of Lunges 
1)Weight loss. 
2)Improves balance and coordination of the body. 
3)Better spinal heath.

Benefits of High 
1)Reduces belly fat. 
2)Improves balance and fitness. 
3)Improves cardiovascular.

Benefits of Bridges 
1)Improves flexibility. 
2)Improves balance. 
3)Relieves back pain.

Benefits of the Cobra Stretch 
1)Strengthens the spine. 
2)Helps relieve stress and fatigue. 
3)Therapeutic for asthma. 
4)Strengthens chest,lungs,shoulders and abdomen.
